cell.html: Began playing the Guitar at the age of ten. Two time winner of the Norwegian National Youth competition.

cell.html: Began playing the Violin at the age of four, but switched to the Cello at five. He currently studies at Yehudi Menuhin School .
cell.text: Began playing the Violin at the age of four, but switched to the Cello at five. He currently studies at Yehudi Menuhin School .

cell.html: Began playing the Harp at the age of ten while also playing the Piano and Violin, currently studies at the Junior Department of the Royal College of Music.

cell.html: Started playing the Violin at eight after being offered free lessons. Student at The Purcell School of Music.

cell.html: Studying at The Purcell School of Music, but also studies at the Junior Department of the Royal Academy of Music and is Principal Oboe of the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain after joining just one year previously. Began playing the Oboe at the age of ten.

cell.html: Began playing the Flute at four years of age, his influence being when he heard Prelude to the Afternoon of a Faun . Studies at St. Mary's Music School in Edinburgh and can also play the Saxophone.

cell.html: Achieved Grade 8 distinction in Singing, Piano and Saxophone as well as playing the clarinet.
cell.text: Achieved Grade 8 distinction in Singing, Piano and Saxophone as well as playing the clarinet.

cell.html: Began playing the Clarinet at eight years of age. Has since achieved Principal Clarinet of the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain after two years of membership.
cell.text: Began playing the Clarinet at eight years of age. Has since achieved Principal Clarinet of the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain after two years of membership.

cell.html: Began playing the French Horn at seven years of age after hearing Mozart’s Horn Concert No 4. Studies at Chetham's School of Music and is a member of the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain .

cell.html: Currently studying at The Purcell School of Music, the Junior Department of the Royal Academy of Music and is a member of the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain .

cell.html: Studies at Chetham's School of Music . Principal Euphonium with the National Youth Brass Band of Great Britain.
cell.text: Studies at Chetham's School of Music . Principal Euphonium with the National Youth Brass Band of Great Britain.

cell.html: Started to play the trombone at the age of six. Held the position of Principal Trombone of the National Children’s Band of Great Britain. Youngest musician in this years competition.
cell.text: Started to play the trombone at the age of six. Held the position of Principal Trombone of the National Children’s Band of Great Britain. Youngest musician in this years competition.

cell.html: Began playing percussion at the age of three. Currently studying at the Trinity College of Music after studying at Chetham's School of Music for three years. Was Co Principal in the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain percussion section.
cell.text: Began playing percussion at the age of three. Currently studying at the Trinity College of Music after studying at Chetham's School of Music for three years. Was Co Principal in the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain percussion section.

cell.html: Studies at Loughborough High School and was influenced to play percussion after seeing the school orchestra performance.
cell.text: Studies at Loughborough High School and was influenced to play percussion after seeing the school orchestra performance.

cell.html: Started playing percussion at the age of seven and is studying at the Chetham's School of Music .
cell.text: Started playing percussion at the age of seven and is studying at the Chetham's School of Music .

cell.html: Began playing percussion at the age of three after his father, a professional drummer bought him a drum set. Studies at the Chetham's School of Music .
cell.text: Began playing percussion at the age of three after his father, a professional drummer bought him a drum set. Studies at the Chetham's School of Music .

cell.html: Began playing piano at the age of six. Currently studying at Wellington School. Been involved on violin in the National Children’s Orchestra of Scotland and the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain .
cell.text: Began playing piano at the age of six. Currently studying at Wellington School. Been involved on violin in the National Children’s Orchestra of Scotland and the National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain .

cell.html: Studies at The Purcell School of Music. Began playing the piano at seven years of age. As well as playing the piano, he has received awards for composing, such as Highly Commended at BBC Proms Composers' Competition 2006.

cell.html: Studying at the Northgate High School in Ipswich and the Junior Department at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama .

cell.html: Began playing piano at the age of six. He studies at the Ballymena Academy and at the Royal Irish Academy of Music in Dublin.
cell.text: Began playing piano at the age of six. He studies at the Ballymena Academy and at the Royal Irish Academy of Music in Dublin.

context.text: BBC Young Musician of the Year - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
In celebration of thirty years of the competition broadcasting, the performances lasted for two days.
BBC Young Musician of the Year
The 2008 finals took place at the Wales Millennium Centre in Cardiff on 10 May 2008 and 11 May 2008 .
The overall number of finalists was significantly smaller for the number of finalists in this competition.
The adjudicators for this competition were Marin Alsop , Carlos Bonell, Peter Sadlo, Thea King , Sergei Nakariakov , Angela Hewitt and Kathryn McDowell.
The 2006 finals were held at The Sage Gateshead on 20 May 2006 .

Finals for the 2004 competition took place on May 02 at the Usher Hall , Edinburgh and were televised on BBC Two . The trophy used for this year's competition was designed by John Rocha at Waterford Crystal .
